title: Tenders & Orders
description: Latest tenders and orders from Government Engineering College, Barmer

tenders.title: Supply of Laboratory Equipment for Computer Science Department
tenders.description: Supply and installation of computer laboratory equipment including workstations, servers, and networking equipment.

tenders.title: Construction of New Academic Block
tenders.description: Construction of a new academic block with classrooms, laboratories, and administrative offices.

tenders.title: Campus Security Services
tenders.description: Provision of security services for the college campus including guards and surveillance systems.

tenders.title: Supply of Sports Equipment
tenders.description: Supply of sports equipment and materials for various sports facilities.

tenders.title: Maintenance of Electrical Systems
tenders.description: Annual maintenance contract for electrical systems and equipment.
